headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Lockheed Martin (LMT) After A Strong Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Lockheed Martin's current share price still offers value or if most of the upside is already priced in, you are in the right place. Lockheed Martin's stock most recently closed at US$522.04, with returns of 7.0% over the last 7 days, 15.4% over the last 30 days, 5.0% year to date, 15.8% over 1 year, 22.5% over 3 years and 75.2% over 5 years.
